ygData.subject: Re: Jewererly craft
ygData.msgSnippet: I s there anyone with concrete info on what stones to use at what skill? I just dont want to waste limited resourses trying ti figure itout ... ... From: HiFi
ygData.messageBody:
I s there anyone with concrete info on what stones to use at what skill? I
just dont want to waste limited resourses trying ti figure itout ...
----- Original Message -----
From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 12:12 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewererly craft


> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> Jade becomes trivial at 40. This should give you an idea of whet
> results to expect. I didn't start working with jade until I hit skill
> level 36. Its cheaper to work with the most inexpensive stone that is
> not yet trivial. I think you should probably be working with about the
> 4th stone on the list. Even with skill level 44 I failed to make a
> jade ring 3 times in a row yesterday. IT's a very expensive trade and
> the rewards have not shown themselves.
>
>
>
> --- Scott <s.fog@...> wrote:
> > From: "Scott" <s.fog@...>
> >
> > Im level 9 now, and i have 23skill pts in jewel
> > craft, what kind of gems
> > should i be working with at that level to gain pts,
> > and how many pts before
> > it try to make a silver jade ring
> >
> >
> >
